hero.title: Services that move you faster
hero.subtitle: Choose the level of support that matches your goals and timeline. Every package is built to increase interviews and offer quality.

tiers.title: Resume Rebuild
tiers.body: A high‑impact resume rewrite that positions you for the roles you want.

tiers.title: Resume + LinkedIn + Cover Letter
tiers.body: A full brand refresh so recruiters see your story clearly across every touchpoint.

tiers.title: Brand + Career Clarity + Interview Practice
tiers.body: Everything above plus coaching to sharpen your narrative and interview performance.

tiers.title: Momentum Coaching (3 sessions)
tiers.body: Three high‑leverage sessions to build strategy, confidence, and execution.

tiers.title: Executive Advisory
tiers.body: Senior‑level narrative refinement, leadership positioning, and offer strategy.

items.question: Which service is right for me?
items.answer: If you need a fast resume upgrade, start with Resume Rebuild. If you want to attract stronger recruiters and roles, go with the full Brand refresh. If you need clarity and execution support, choose the Brand + Clarity package.

items.question: Do you work with senior or executive candidates?
items.answer: Yes. Executive Advisory is built for senior ICs, leaders, and managers who need higher‑level positioning and negotiation strategy.

items.question: How long does the process take?
items.answer: Most packages move from kickoff to delivery in 7–14 days. Coaching timelines depend on your availability, but most clients see momentum within 2–6 weeks.

items.question: Do you help with interviews?
items.answer: Yes. The Brand + Clarity package includes interview practice, and Momentum Coaching focuses heavily on interview performance and offer strategy.

items.question: Will you tailor for my target roles?
items.answer: Yes. Every package begins with role targeting to ensure your materials and story align with the positions you want next.

cta.title: Not sure which path fits?
cta.body: Book a quick call and we’ll help you choose the best option for your goals.
